commits.author: Curt Sellmer
commits.summary: Remove rules recognizing invalid escapes sequences
commits.body:
According to the spec there are no invalid escape sequences,
because the load() method will simply ignore a backslash before
any character that does not denote a known escape sequence.

commits.author: Curt Sellmer
commits.summary: Rewrite grammar for Java Properties files.
commits.body:
Recognize line continuations as a separate type of punctuation.
Better handling for escape sequences in both keys and values.
Display invalid escape sequences.
Handle keys without values correctly.
Add disableIndentCorrections := true for properties files as
indent corrections are more annoying than helpful for this type of file.

commits.author: Alexander Lent
commits.summary: Alter constant string snippet to be more standard
commits.body:
Most style guidelines recommend that the keywords are in alphabetic order, so rearrange them to be in this order.

See Google's style guidelines: https://google-styleguide.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/javaguide.html#s4.8.7-modifiers
See the Java Language Specification: http://docs.oracle.com/javase/specs/jls/se7/html/jls-3.html#jls-3.9

Companion to commit 2024f8e9afa4fe109b8c0a30d55856fb92a93f7c

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: Revised to be current as of Java SE 8, add test document. Fixes #26.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Ensure variable name is not a reserved word
commits.body: Also do not allow variable name to be a carriage return, fixes #22.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: Excludes @Annotation lines from indentNextLinePattern when they are on a line by themselves or are followed by `(`. Fixes #19.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.summary: Rewrite grammar to better match spec
commits.body: This solves several issues with the previous grammar. Also change root scope to longer treat source.java as a parent grammar. Fixes #8 and #23.

commits.author: Michael Sheets
commits.body: Simple require a closing brace at the start of a line to decrease the indent level rather than checking the rest of the line. This improves behavior in if/else cases where braces, etc are placed after the closing brace. Fixes #24.
